text: Blind Date is a romantic comedy movie released in 1987. It was directed by Blake Edwards and featured Bruce Willis in his first credited lead role, alongside Kim Basinger. Although the movie received mostly negative reviews from critics, it performed well financially and debuted at the top of the box office charts. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1987 romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in the 1980s
title: Blind Date (1987 movie)
